system.effect: Feel the elemental power surge through you!
system.redTextEffectBM:
When this potion is drank, the GM picks a random element. For the remainder of combat, the character gains the following bonuses:
                       
                                        * +1d4 damage of the chosen element.
                                        * Immune to the chosen element. 
                                        * Any time the character takes damage of the chosen element, heal 1d4 health.
